title: error msg="gRPC panicked!" error="runtime error: slice bounds out of range [:250] with capacity 1"
body:
### Description

Hi Team, we see this errors from our nodes.
We are using beacon-chain with below flags:
```      - args:
        - --datadir=/data
        - --http-web3provider=http://ethereum1-testnet:8545
        - --rpc-host=0.0.0.0
        - --rpc-port=4000
        - --grpc-gateway-host=0.0.0.0
        - --grpc-gateway-port=3500
        - --monitoring-host=0.0.0.0
        - --monitoring-port=6668
        - --p2p-max-peers=500
        - --block-batch-limit=512
        - --medalla
        command:
        - /app/beacon-chain/image.binary
        image: gcr.io/prysmaticlabs/prysm/beacon-chain:v1.0.0-alpha.29
```
Log:
